none: 宮城県鹿島神社の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Kashima Shrine, Miyagi (Original)

鹿島神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 表示 - 非営利 4.0 国際： https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank Kashima Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive. CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
宮城県伊具郡丸森町小斎日向5 ‎・5 Kozai Hinata, Marumori Town, Igu District, Miyagi Prefecture
山並算右衛門美篤門人高野恒佐安解・San'emon Yamanami Bitoku's disciple Tsunesuke Takano Ankai
